trans-unit.source: Wraps an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> whose execution is initialized by an event.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta una <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> cuya ejecución se inicializa con un evento.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: It is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> that is used to handle an event; typically it can be raised from the host or by the runtime in response to a delay timer expiring.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> que se usa para gestionar un evento; normalmente, se puede provocar desde el host o mediante el tiempo de ejecución como respuesta al caducar el temporizador de retraso.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> is inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; therefore, it is a sequence that has the additional restriction that the first activity should be an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> se hereda de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; por lo tanto, se trata de una secuencia que cuenta con la restricción adicional de que la primera actividad debería ser <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> es una <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, lo que significa que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> puede contener otras actividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> is similar to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> activity, with some additional characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> es similar a la actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>, con algunas características adicionales.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> must have a parent that is either a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> debe tener un elemento primario que sea <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The first child of an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activity must be an activity that inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: El primer elemento secundario de una actividad <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> debe ser una actividad que se hereda de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.

trans-unit.source: All subsequent children can be activities of any type.
trans-unit.target: Todos los elementos secundarios subsiguientes pueden ser actividades de cualquier tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> blocks and waits for the pending occurrence of some events, such as starting a timer or the arrival of a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> bloquea y espera que ocurran algunos eventos pendientes, como el inicio de un temporizador o la llegada de un mensaje.

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> finishes running and then all subsequent activities are executed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se produce el evento, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> termina de ejecutarse y, a continuación, se ejecutan todas las actividades subsiguientes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contains an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> has some restrictions:
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contiene una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> tiene algunas restricciones:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> may contain one, and only one, activity of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> puede contener una, y sólo una, actividad del tipo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> must be the first child activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> debe ser la primera actividad secundaria.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> cannot be in the event handler for a child activity and cannot be a child to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> if the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is not the first child.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> no puede estar en el controlador de eventos para una actividad secundaria y no puede ser un elemento secundario de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> si <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> no es el primer elemento secundario.

trans-unit.source: As long as the first activity is the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, the event handler can contain any activities.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que la primera actividad es <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, el controlador de eventos puede contener cualquier actividad.

trans-unit.source: If an activity other than <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, that activity cannot have an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> contiene una actividad distinta de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, esa actividad no puede tener un controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that supports event handling can be used inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> but the activity cannot have event handlers attached to itself.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, se puede usar una actividad que admita el control de eventos dentro de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, pero la actividad no puede tener los controladores de eventos asociados a ella misma.

trans-unit.source: Another example is that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, but the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> itself cannot contain any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> classes.
trans-unit.target: Otro ejemplo es que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> puede contener un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, pero el <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> no puede contener ninguna clase de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> to perform state machine transitions.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra cómo usar la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> para realizar las transiciones del equipo de estado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte del ejemplo de SDK de SimpleStateMachineWorkflow del archivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [equipo de estado Simple](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra cómo crear una nueva instancia de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte del ejemplo de SDK de SimpleStateMachineWorkflow del archivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [equipo de estado Simple](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: The user-identified name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la actividad identificado por el usuario.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> utilizando el nombre de la actividad.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la actividad de evento que controla el cambio.

trans-unit.source: The event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: La actividad de evento que controla el cambio.
